emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of nonagenarian Lula "Big Mama" Turner wearing paisley dress, boots, and head scarf, performing "the twist" dance in her living room
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "Twisting at 98 - Life begins at 90, according to Mrs. Lula (Big Mama) Turner, who recently celebrated her 98th birthday by doing an impromptu twist for Courier cameraman 'Teenie' Harris. Actually, 'Big Mama' is a devout churchwoman and usually limits her 'twisting' to the vigorous movements she makes while singing her favorite hymns.  See story on page 3. - Harris Photo."
